name: Employee Onboarding Process
description: Onboard new employees by collecting their details, setting up workspace and system access, creating documentation, and providing orientation materials

steps.guidance: I'll help you onboard a new employee. First, let me collect their basic information.
Now I'll help set up their workspace and system access.
I'll create onboarding documentation and checklists for the new employee.
Finally, I'll compile all onboarding materials and provide next steps.
